@everyone SAFARI SIEGE 6/17/25 @ 5PM EST A wild challenge awaits. More information coming soon!

@everyone ğŸŒ¿ Safari Siege (6/17/25) ğŸŒ¿ The wild calls, and we answer. We are Shiny Legion â€” many, relentless, united in purpose. Within the shadows of the Safari, rare prey lurk, but they cannot hide from the Legionâ€™s gaze. The Siege begins. One by one, the targets will fall. We are many. We are Legion. And the Safari will remember us. ğŸ¯ How to Play: ğŸ”¹ Enter the Safari Zone when the Siege begins. ğŸ”¹ Hunt and catch the PokÃ©mon that match the targets on the BINGO board. ğŸ”¹ Each time you catch a target, whisper it to the host(s) in a link. They will mark your squares. ğŸ”¹ The first hunter to complete a BINGO (5 in a row â€” horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) claims victory. âš”ï¸ Rules: âœ… Only catches made during the event period count. âœ… All catches must come from the announced Safari Zone location. âœ… You must provide proof for each entry in a whisper to the host(s). âœ… OT only â€” you must be the original trainer of your catches. âœ… PokÃ©mon must remain unchanged (no evolving, breeding, or modifying). âœ… Only one character per participant may join the Siege. ğŸ† Prizes: ğŸ‘‘ 1st Place: 5Ã—31 Jolly Alpha Shroomish (EV Trained and level 1 | Donated by @Ricxn ) â€” a true prize for the swiftest of the Many. âš¡ 2nd Place: 3Ã—31 Jolly Shroomish (EV Trained and level 1) â€” earned by the hunter who follows close behind. The BINGO board will be posted at the start of the event. All players participating will meet at Kanto Safari Zone Ch. 2 at 5PM EST.
This is not the channel for those conversations. Please use an approprite channel.
@everyone 30 minutes until it starts! All players participating will meet at Kanto Safari Zone Ch. 2
@everyone Here is the BINGO board for the event! No caught mons before 5PM EST will be taken for an entry! https://i.imgur.com/MvJdseV.png
1st Place: @Kole 2nd Place: @FlameGamerU 3rd Place: @EmmiBlack Thank you for the turnout and participation! I hope you all had fun

@everyone Sunday August 17th, 2025 at 5pm. I will be hosting a game of Hide and Seek! Each time soneone finds me I will figure out a prize! It can be something from a pokemon to a random item. It's just for some fun and to test game knowledge! I hope to see everyone there!
